Stellan Vinthagen (Amụrụ n'ọnwa October 13, 1964) bụ prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye ọkà mmụta na-eme ihe ike, na Onye isi oche Inaugural Endowed na Study of Nonviolent Direct Action and Civil Resistance na Mahadum Massachusetts, Amherst, ebe ọ na-eduzi Resistance Studies Initiative. Ọ bụkwa onye isi nke Resistance Studies Group na Mahadum Gothenburg na onye guzobere Resistance Studies Network, yana onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Journal of Resistance Studies, na onye otu Council nke War Resisters International (WRI), na onye ndụmọdụ agụmakwụkwọ na International Center on Nonviolent Conflict (ICNC). Nnyocha ya na-elekwasị anya na nguzogide, ike, mmegharị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, omume na-enweghị ime ihe ike, mgbanwe esemokwu na mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze
Kemgbe afọ 1980, ọ bụ onye nkuzi, onye nhazi na onye na-eme ihe ike n'ọtụtụ mba, ma sonye n'ihe karịrị 30 na-enweghị ihe ike, nke ọ jere ozi n'ozuzu ihe karịrị otu afọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ.
Vinthagen nwere PhD (2005) na Peace and Development Research na Mahadum Gothenburg
N'ime edemede ya, a na-akọwa usoro okpukpe nke omume na-enweghị ime ihe ike site n'aka onye na-eme atụmatụ nke ndị India na-emegide ọchịchị, Mohandas K
Gandhi, site n'enyemaka nke sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke oge a ma nye ya echiche ụwa
O dere ma ọ bụ dezie akwụkwọ asatọ na ọtụtụ isiokwu, n'etiti ndị na-adịbeghị anya: Nonviolent Resistance and Culture, n'afọ 2012 (ya na M
Sørensen) na Peace & Change, na Tackling Trident (nke Irene Publishing).
